title: What do you think is a good life? - Quora

response.answer_text: A good life is not one where you have a lot but where you need very little to be happy and content. A good life is when you learn to enjoy every minute of it. When you learn to be happy NOW. When you realize that you don’t need to wait for something outside of yourself to make you happy in the future. A good life is when everyone you know associates your name or your image with kindness, goodness, warmth and love. Just think how really precious is the time you have to spend with your family or loved ones and that’s why every minute should be enjoyed and savored. A good life is inevitable when you stay healthy, positive and happy. When you work hard and never give up hope. A good life is when you are open to criticism and keep learning every day. Anyone who stops learning is old, whether at twenty or eighty. When you keep learning you stay young and the greatest thing in life is to keep your mind always young. A good life is when you surround yourself with loving, happy, warm, and genuine people. A good life is one where you have someone to share it with. A good life is when your heart is full of love and you have someone to give that love to. A Good Life is a series of trials and errors and the sooner you accept that the better. What looks like a mistake to others has been a milestone for me. Even if people have betrayed me, even if my heart was broken, even if I was misunderstood or judged, I have managed to learn from everything and never lost the lesson, even when I lost everything else. We are human, we are flawed and we all make mistakes but learning from them, not losing the lesson, is what makes all the difference in the world. Learning life’s lessons is not about making your life perfect but about seeing life as it was meant to be. I read some place that someone said: “A happy life is one spent in learning, earning and yearning.” I tend to agree…

1.A good life is one in which you realize that you value your inner peace and happiness more than others'. 2.A good life is  one in which you learn to take criticisms in an optimistic way. 3.A good life is one in which  you realize that  there is no point in trying to impress and please others for your happiness. 4.A good life is one in which you realize that your parents are your only well wishers.And there are three categories of people-Those who don't care,those who pretend to care and those who are happy with your misery and jealous with your success. 5.A good life is one in which you realize your own potential and shortcomings and try to exploit your potential and work on your shortcomings. 6.A good life is one in which you realize the value of time and money and prioritizing according to the change in situations. 7.A good life is one in which you realize that you are independent in this world and not dependent on anyone. 8.A good life is one in which you  realize that every aphorism works on a given set of conditions. 9.A good life is one in which you try to respect people irrespective of the nature of their occupation. 10.A good life is one in which you respect others' opinions and apply that constructively in your decision making process. 11.A good life is one in which you respond to situations instead of reacting. 12.A good life is when you realize that life is a Dynamic Programming and you need to memoize the failures i.e learn from failures to avoid repetition in future. 13.A good life is when you curb all momentary short -term temptations to live a successful long-term life 14.A good life is when you realize that material possessions provide you happiness temporarily. It is not a substitute for peace. 15.A good life is when you realize that change is inevitable and interim twists and turns are so normal. 16.A good life is when you trust your ability and never compare with others in terms of money ,people or talent.
